    • Method Detail

      • create

        Absence create​(Absence absence,
               int empId,
               int absenceReasonId)
        Creates and saves a given absence in the data base with inserted employee and absence reason.
        Parameters:
        absence - the absence to create.
        empId - the employee's id to insert.
        absenceReasonId - absence reason's id to insert.
        Returns:
        the created object.

      • update

        void update​(Absence absence,
            int empId,
            int absenceReasonId)
     throws NotFoundException
        Updates an existing in the data base absence with inserted employee and absence reason.
        Parameters:
        absence - the absence to update.
        empId - the employee's id to insert.
        absenceReasonId - absence reason's id to insert.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if there aren't updated object in the data base.
